result.markdown:
---
title: "Olympics 100m Dash Over 100 Years"
author: "Rochelle Rafn"
date: "12/8/2021"
categories: [data, visualization, code, news]
image: "thumbnail.jpeg"
---












#### Pulling out Mens' 100m World Records (different than Olympic records because of other track events that can also result in world records)

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
oly_men_100m_record <- oly_men_100m %>%
  filter(Record %in% c("WR)", "=WR)"))%>%
  group_by(Year, Time)
```
:::


#### Pulling out Womens' World Records (different than Olympic records because of other track events that can also result in world records)

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
oly_women_100m_record <- oly_women_clean %>%
  filter(Record %in% c("WR)", "=WR)"), Event == "100 metres")%>%
  group_by(Year, Time)
```
:::


#### Pulling out Mens' 200m World Records (different than Olympic records because of other track events that can also result in world records)

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
oly_men_200m_record <- oly_men_clean %>%
  filter(Record %in% c("WR)", "=WR)"), Event == "200 metres")%>%
  group_by(Year, Time)
```
:::


#### Pulling out Womens' 200m World Records (different than Olympic records because of other track events that can also result in world records)

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
oly_women_200m_record <- oly_women_clean %>%
  filter(Record %in% c("WR)", "=WR)"), Event == "200 metres")%>%
  group_by(Year, Time)
```
:::


#### Men's 100 Meter Medals Over Time

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
men100m_graph <- oly_men_100m %>%
  ggplot(aes(Year, Time, color = Medal))+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 3)+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point(data = oly_men_100m_record, aes(Year, Time), color = "turquoise", size = 3, alpha = 0.5)+
  geom_rect(xmin=1939, xmax=1945, ymin=9.6, ymax=10.64, color = "grey", linetype = "dotted", alpha = 0)+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 1967, linetype = "dotted", color = "grey", size = 0.75)+
  theme(panel.background = element_blank(),
        plot.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        plot.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        axis.text = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.text = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.background = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
         legend.key = element_rect(fill = "white"))+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#FFB48C", "#EBD739", "#B5BCC2"))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1936, 1944, 1952, 1960, 1968, 1976, 1984, 1992, 2000, 2008, 2016),
                     labels = c("1936", "1944", "1952", "1960", "1968", "1976", "1984", "1992", "2000", "2008", "2016"))+
  geom_text(aes(1976, 9.65), label = "PEDs Banned", size = 3.8, family = "Courier", color = "grey")+
  labs(title = "Gold, Silver & Bronze Medals Over Time",
       subtitle = "Mens 100m Dash",
       y = "Time (in seconds)")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
â„¹ Please use `linewidth` instead.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
men100m_graph
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


#### Women's 100 Meter Medals Over Time
##### 2000 Women's 100M gold: The gold medal was originally won by Marion Jones of the United States. However, on 5 October 2007, she admitted to having used performance-enhancing drugs prior to the 2000 Olympics. On 9 October she relinquished her medals to the United States Olympic Committee, and on 12 December the International Olympic Committee formally stripped her of her medals.
The IOC did not initially decide to regrade the results, as silver medalist Ekaterini Thanou had herself been subsequently involved in a doping scandal in the run-up to the 2004 Summer Olympics. After two years of deliberation, in late 2009 the IOC decided to upgrade Lawrence (original bronze) and Ottey (original 4th) to silver and bronze respectively, and leave Thanou as a silver medallist, with the gold medal withheld.## 

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
women100m_graph <- oly_women_100m %>%
  ggplot(aes(Year, Time, color = Medal))+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 3)+
  geom_point(data = oly_women_100m_record, aes(Year, Time), color = "turquoise", size = 3, alpha = 0.5)+
  geom_line()+
  geom_rect(xmin=1939, xmax=1945, ymin=10.5, ymax=12.25, color = "grey", linetype = "dotted", alpha = 0)+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 1967, linetype = "dotted", color = "grey", size = 0.75)+
   labs(title = "Gold, Silver & Bronze Medals Over 100 Years",
       subtitle = "Womens 100m Dash",
       y = "Time (in seconds)")+
  theme(panel.background = element_blank(),
        plot.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        plot.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        axis.text = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.text = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.background = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
         legend.key = element_rect(fill = "white"))+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#FFB48C", "#EBD739", "#B5BCC2"))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1936, 1944, 1952, 1960, 1968, 1976, 1984, 1992, 2000, 2008, 2016),
                     labels = c("1936", "1944", "1952", "1960", "1968", "1976", "1984", "1992", "2000", "2008", "2016"))+
  geom_text(aes(1976, 10.55), label = "PEDs Banned", size = 3.8, family = "Courier", color = "grey")

women100m_graph
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

```
:::

#### Men's 200 Meter Medals Over Time

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
men200m_graph <- oly_men_200m %>%
  ggplot(aes(Year, Time, color = Medal))+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 3)+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point(data = oly_men_200m_record, aes(Year, Time), color = "turquoise", size = 3, alpha = 0.5)+
  geom_rect(xmin=1939, xmax=1945, ymin=19.21, ymax=21.39, color = "grey", linetype = "dotted", alpha = 0)+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 1967, linetype = "dotted", color = "grey", size = 0.75)+
   labs(title = "Gold, Silver & Bronze Medals Over 100 Years",
       subtitle = "Mens 200m Dash",
       y = "Time (in seconds)")+
  theme(panel.background = element_blank(),
        plot.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        plot.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        axis.text = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.text = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.background = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.key = element_rect(fill = "white"))+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#FFB48C", "#EBD739", "#B5BCC2"))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1936, 1944, 1952, 1960, 1968, 1976, 1984, 1992, 2000, 2008, 2016),
                     labels = c("1936", "1944", "1952", "1960", "1968", "1976", "1984", "1992", "2000", "2008", "2016"))+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(19.2, 19.6, 20, 20.4, 20.8, 21.2),
                     labels = c("19.2", "19.6", "20", "20.4", "20.8", "21.2"),
                     limits = c(19.2, 21.4),
                     expand = c(0,0))+
  geom_text(aes(1954, 19.35), label = "World War II", size = 3.8, family = "Courier", color = "grey")+
  geom_text(aes(1976, 19.35), label = "PEDs Banned", size = 3.8, family = "Courier", color = "grey")

men200m_graph
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


#### Women's 200 Meter Medals Over Time

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
women200m_graph <- oly_women_200m %>%
  ggplot(aes(Year, Time, color = Medal))+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 3)+
  geom_point(data = oly_women_200m_record, aes(Year, Time), color = "turquoise", size = 3, alpha = 0.5)+
  geom_line()+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 1967, linetype = "dotted", color = "grey", size = 0.75)+
   labs(title = "Gold, Silver & Bronze Medals Over Time",
       subtitle = "Womens 200m Dash",
       y = "Time (in seconds)")+
  theme(panel.background = element_blank(),
        plot.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        plot.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        axis.text = element_text(family = "Courier"),
        legend.text = element_text(family = "Courier"),

        axis.title = element_text(family = "Courier"),
         legend.key = element_rect(fill = "white"))+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#FFB48C", "#EBD739", "#B5BCC2"))+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1948, 1956, 1962, 1970, 1976, 1984, 1992, 2000, 2008, 2016),
                     labels = c("1948", "1956", "1964", "1972", "1980", "1988", "1996", "2004", "2012", "2020"))+
  geom_text(aes(1975, 21.5), label = "PEDs Banned", size = 3.8, family = "Courier", color = "grey")
```
